CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[tableRowCounts]
WITH
(
 DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE
 ,HEAP
)
AS
SELECT
	QUOTENAME(schema_name([tab].[schema_id])) + '.' + QUOTENAME([tab].[name]) as TableName,
	0 AS [InternalRowCount],
	CONCAT('[@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].',QUOTENAME([tab].[name])) as ExternalTable,
	-1 AS ExternalRowCount
FROM
	[sys].[tables] as tab
INNER JOIN
	[sys].[partitions] as part
ON
	[tab].[object_id] = [part].[object_id]
WHERE
	schema_name([tab].[schema_id]) NOT IN ('@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}', '___ibCreateDb___')
GROUP BY
	QUOTENAME(schema_name([tab].[schema_id])) + '.' + QUOTENAME([tab].[name]),
	CONCAT('[@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].',QUOTENAME([tab].[name]))
OPTION (LABEL = 'BACKUP: Get all tables and prepare for row counts');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[partitionedTables]
WITH
(
 DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE
 ,HEAP
)
AS
SELECT 
    [pt].[table_name],
    [si].[index_id],
    [si].[name] AS index_name,
    ISNULL([pf].[name], 'NonAligned') AS partition_function,
    ISNULL([sc].[name], [fg].[name]) AS partition_scheme_or_filegroup,
    [ic].[partition_ordinal],
    [ic].[key_ordinal],
    [ic].[is_included_column],
    [c].[name] AS column_name,
    [t].[name] AS data_type_name,
    [c].[is_identity],
    [ic].[is_descending_key],
    [si].[filter_definition]
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT 
		[t].[object_id],
		[t].[name] AS table_name
	FROM 
		[sys].[tables] AS t
    JOIN 
		[sys].[indexes] AS si
	ON
		[t].[object_id]=[si].[object_id]
    JOIN 
		[sys].[partition_schemes] AS sc
	ON
		[si].[data_space_id]=[sc].[data_space_id]
	) AS pt
JOIN
	[sys].[indexes] AS si
ON
	[pt].[object_id]=[si].[object_id]
JOIN
	[sys].[index_columns] AS ic
ON
	[si].[object_id]=[ic].[object_id]
AND
	[si].[index_id]=[ic].[index_id]
JOIN
	[sys].[columns] AS c
ON
	[ic].[object_id]=[c].[object_id]
AND
	[ic].[column_id]=[c].[column_id]
JOIN 
	[sys].[types] AS t 
ON
	[c].[system_type_id]=[t].[system_type_id]
LEFT JOIN
	[sys].[partition_schemes] AS sc 
ON
	[si].[data_space_id]=[sc].[data_space_id]
LEFT JOIN
	[sys].[partition_functions] AS pf
ON
	[sc].[function_id]=[pf].[function_id]
LEFT JOIN
	[sys].[filegroups] as fg
ON
	[si].[data_space_id]=[fg].[data_space_id]
WHERE
	[ic].[partition_ordinal] = 1
OPTION (LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get partition information for the tables');


CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[partitionedFunctions]
WITH
(
 DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE
 ,HEAP
)
AS
SELECT 
f.name,
	(case when f.boundary_value_on_right=0 then 'LEFT' else 'RIGHT' end) as LeftOrRight, 
	STRING_AGG(CAST(v.value as nvarchar(100)), ', ') as PartitionFunctionValues
FROM  
	sys.partition_functions f
inner join  
	sys.partition_range_values v
on 
	f.function_id = v.function_id
inner join 
	sys.partition_parameters p
on f.function_id = p.function_id
inner join sys.types t
on t.system_type_id = p.system_type_id
Group BY f.name, f.boundary_value_on_right
OPTION (LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get partition functions');


SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[schemas]
WITH
(
 DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE
 ,HEAP
)

SELECT
	[name]
FROM

WHERE 
	[name] NOT IN ('sys','INFORMATION_SCHEMA', 'sysdiag','@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}')
OPTION 
	(LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get schemas');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TableColumnInfo] 
WITH 
( 
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, 
	HEAP 
) AS 
SELECT 
	QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) as SchemaName, 
	QUOTENAME([tbl].[Name]) as Table_Name, 
	[c].[column_id], 
	QUOTENAME([c].[name]) as COLUMN_NAME, 
	[d].[distribution_ordinal], 
	[ordinal_position], 
	ISNULL('DEFAULT ' + [dc].[definition], '')*1 as DefaultConstraint, 
	[tdp].[distribution_policy], 
	CASE [tdp].[distribution_policy] 
	WHEN 2 THEN 
	'WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( ' 
	WHEN 3 THEN 
	'WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,' 
	WHEN 4 THEN 
	'WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, ' 
	END AS distribution_text, 
	'[' + CAST([cols].[COLUMN_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + '] ' + 
				CASE [cols].[DATA_TYPE] 
				WHEN 'binary' THEN 
				CASE [cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] 
					WHEN -1 THEN ' binary(MAX)' 
					ELSE ' binary(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
					END 
				WHEN 'varbinary' THEN 
					CASE cols.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] 
					WHEN -1 THEN ' varbinary(MAX)' 
					ELSE ' varbinary(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
					END 
				WHEN 'char' THEN ' char(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ') COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
				WHEN 'varchar' THEN 
					CASE cols.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] 
					WHEN -1 THEN ' varchar(MAX) COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
					ELSE ' varchar(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ') COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
					END 
				WHEN 'nchar' THEN ' nchar(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ') COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
				WHEN 'nvarchar' THEN 
				CASE cols.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] 
					WHEN -1 THEN ' nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
					ELSE ' nvarchar(' + CAST([cols].[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ') COLLATE '+ CAST([cols].[collation_name] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) 
					END 
				WHEN 'float' THEN ' float(' + CAST([cols].[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				WHEN 'datetime2' THEN ' datetime2(' + CAST([cols].[DATETIME_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				WHEN 'datetimeoffset' THEN ' datetimeoffset(' + CAST([cols].[DATETIME_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				WHEN 'time' THEN ' time(' + CAST([cols].[DATETIME_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				WHEN 'decimal' THEN ' decimal(' + CAST([cols].[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ', ' + CAST([cols].[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				WHEN 'numeric' THEN ' numeric(' + CAST([cols].[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ', ' + CAST([cols].[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NVARCHAR(1000)) + ')' 
				ELSE [cols].[DATA_TYPE] 
				END  
				+ CASE [cols].[IS_NULLABLE] 
				WHEN 'YES' THEN ' NULL' 
				ELSE ' NOT NULL' 
				END AS ColumnCreateText 
FROM 
	[sys].[columns] AS c 
JOIN 
	[sys].[pdw_column_distribution_properties] AS d 
ON 
	[c].[object_id] = [d].[object_id] 
AND 
	[c].[column_id] = [d].[column_id] 
JOIN 
	[sys].[types] AS t 
ON 
	[t].[user_type_id] = [c].[user_type_id] 
LEFT JOIN 
	[sys].[default_constraints] AS dc 
ON 
	[c].[default_object_id] = [dc].[object_id] 
AND 
	[c].[object_id] = [dc].[parent_object_id] 
INNER JOIN 
	[sys].[tables] AS tbl 
ON 
	[tbl].[object_id] = [c].[object_id] 
AND 
	[tbl].[type] = 'U' 
INNER JOIN 
	[INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] as cols 
ON 
	QUOTENAME([cols].[table_name]) = QUOTENAME([tbl].[name]) 
AND 
	QUOTENAME([cols].[table_Schema]) = QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) 
AND 
	QUOTENAME([cols].[column_name]) = QUOTENAME([c].[name]) 
INNER JOIN 
	[sys].[pdw_table_distribution_properties] AS tdp 
ON 
	[tdp].[object_id] = [tbl].[object_id] 
WHERE 
	schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])  NOT IN ('sys','INFORMATION_SCHEMA', 'sysdiag','@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}') 
OPTION 
	(LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get table column information');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[Tables] 
WITH 
( 
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, 
	HEAP 
) AS 
SELECT 
	DISTINCT [SchemaName], 
	[Table_Name], 
	[distribution_policy], 
	CASE 
		WHEN [distribution_policy] = 2 THEN 'WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH (' + (SELECT STRING_AGG ([COLUMN_NAME] , ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [SchemaName], [TABLE_NAME] ASC) AS [Columns] FROM [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TableColumnInfo] AS b WHERE [a].[SchemaName] = [b].[SchemaName] AND [a].[Table_Name] = [b].[Table_Name] AND [distribution_ordinal] = 1   GROUP BY [SchemaName],[TABLE_NAME]) + '), HEAP)' 
		WHEN [distribution_policy] = 3 THEN 'WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)' 
		WHEN [distribution_policy] = 4 THEN 'WITH (DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, HEAP)' 
	END AS Distr, 
	(SELECT STRING_AGG ([ColumnCreateText] , ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [SchemaName], [TABLE_NAME] ASC) AS [Columns] FROM [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TableColumnInfo] AS b WHERE [a].[SchemaName] = [b].[SchemaName] AND [a].[Table_Name] = [b].[Table_Name]  GROUP BY [SchemaName],[TABLE_NAME]) AS Cols 
FROM 
	[@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TableColumnInfo] AS a 
OPTION 
	(LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Create table creation information');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TablesCcis] 
WITH 
( 
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, 
	HEAP 
) AS 
SELECT 
		schema_name([tbl].[schema_id]) AS SchemaName, 
		[tbl].[name] AS TableName, 
		'CREATE CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX ' + QUOTENAME([ix].[name]) + ' ON ' + QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) + '.'  + QUOTENAME([tbl].[name]) + ' ORDER (' + STRING_AGG(QUOTENAME([c].[name]), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [column_store_order_ordinal] ASC) + ');' AS CreateIndexText 
	FROM 
		[sys].[indexes] AS ix 
	INNER JOIN 
		[sys].[tables] AS tbl 
	ON 
		[tbl].[object_id]=[ix].[object_id] 
	AND 
		[tbl].[type] = 'U' 
	INNER JOIN 
		[sys].[index_columns] AS col 
	ON 
		[ix].[object_id] = [col].[object_id] 
	LEFT JOIN 
		[sys].[columns] AS c 
	ON 
		[c].[column_id] = [col].[column_id] 
	AND 
		[c].[object_id] = [col].[object_id] 
	WHERE 
		[ix].[type] = 5 
	AND 
		[column_store_order_ordinal] > 0 
	GROUP BY 
		schema_name([tbl].[schema_id]) ,[tbl].[name], [ix].[name] 
	UNION ALL 
	SELECT 
		schema_name([tbl].[schema_id]) AS SchemaName, 
		[tbl].[name] AS TableName, 
		'CREATE CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX ' + QUOTENAME([ix].[name]) + ' ON ' + QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) + '.'  + QUOTENAME([tbl].[name])  + ');' AS CreateIndexText 
	FROM 
		[sys].[indexes] AS ix 
	INNER JOIN 
		[sys].[tables] AS tbl 
	ON 
		[tbl].[object_id]=[ix].[object_id] 
	AND 
		[tbl].[type] = 'U' 
	INNER JOIN 
		[sys].[index_columns] AS col 
	ON 
		[ix].[object_id] = [col].[object_id] 
	LEFT JOIN 
		[sys].[columns] AS c 
	ON 
		[c].[column_id] = [col].[column_id] 
	AND 
		[c].[object_id] = [col].[object_id] 
	WHERE 
		[ix].[type] = 5 
	AND 
		[column_store_order_ordinal] = 0 
	GROUP BY 
		schema_name([tbl].[schema_id]) ,[tbl].[name] , [ix].[name] 
	OPTION 
		(LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get clustered column store indexes');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[TableStatInfo]
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	HEAP
) AS 
SELECT 
	QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) AS schema_name, 
	QUOTENAME([tbl].[name]) AS table_name,
	QUOTENAME([s].[name]) AS stat_name, 
	[sc].[stats_column_id], 
	QUOTENAME([c].[name]) AS column_name
FROM
	[sys].[stats] AS s  
INNER JOIN
	[sys].[tables] AS tbl
ON
	[tbl].[object_id]=s.[object_id]
AND
	[tbl].[type] = 'U'  
JOIN 
	[sys].[stats_columns] AS sc
ON
	s.[stats_id] = [sc].[stats_id] 
AND 
	s.[object_id] = [sc].[object_id]  
JOIN 
	[sys].[columns] AS c 
ON 
	[c].[column_id] = [sc].[column_id]
AND
	[c].[object_id] = [sc].[object_id]
WHERE
	QUOTENAME(schema_name([tbl].[schema_id])) NOT IN ('[@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}]')
OPTION 
	(LABEL = 'ibBACKUP: Get all statistics, including system created');
SELECT 1;

CREATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.sql_BackupSchemaName}].[Views]
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	HEAP
) AS

	[c].[definition], 
	quotename([b].[name]) + '.' + quotename([a].[name]) AS ObjectName

	[a].[schema_id] = [b].[schema_id]
